text: Love Is Where You Find It is the eleventh studio album by American R&B;/Soul group the Whispers. Released on April 5, 1982, by SOLAR Records, this album reached number 1 on the Billboard Soul Albums chart. ==Track listing== #"In the Raw" (Charmaine Sylvers, Dana Meyers, Glen Barbee) 5:56 #"Turn Me Out" (Dana Meyers, Nidra Beard) 5:53 #"Cruisin' In" (Charmaine Sylvers, Karen Elliot, Nidra Beard) 3:12 #"Emergency" (Nidra Beard, William Shelby) 4:19 #"Say Yes" (Nicholas Caldwell) 5:14 #"Love Is Where You Find It" (Mickey Carroll) 5:23 #"Only You" (Dub Putnam, Nina James) 4:28 #"Small Talkin'" (Norman M. Williams) 4:04 ==Charts== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Chart (1982) !
